Enrollment Request Approved: ${current.course.getDisplayValue()} Section ${current.section.getDisplayValue()}
// Send only to the student who requested enrollment answer = current.requested_for.sys_id;

Hello ${current.requested_for.first_name},
Good news – your request to enroll in course ${current.course.getDisplayValue()} section ${current.section.getDisplayValue()} has been **APPROVED**.
Thank you for using the Class Enrollment Management Portal.
Regards, The CEM Team

Enrollment Request Rejected: ${current.course.getDisplayValue()} Section ${current.section.getDisplayValue()}
// Notify only the student that their request was rejected answer = current.requested_for.sys_id;

Hello ${current.requested_for.first_name},
We’re sorry – your request to enroll in course ${current.course.getDisplayValue()} section ${current.section.getDisplayValue()} has been **REJECTED**.
If you feel this is an error or have questions, please contact your administrator.
Regards, The CEM Team
